headline: CME Group Named as First-Ever Chicago White Sox Jersey Patch Sponsor
summary: The Chicago White Sox today announced a multiyear agreement establishing CME Group, the world's leading derivatives marketplace, as the team's inaugural jersey patch sponsor and Official Global Exchange Partner.

raw.headline: CME Group Named as First-Ever Chicago White Sox Jersey Patch Sponsor
raw.summary: The Chicago White Sox today announced a multiyear agreement establishing CME Group, the world's leading derivatives marketplace, as the team's inaugural jersey patch sponsor and Official Global Exchange Partner.

headline: 'Foot Locker Takeover' Unites Basketball, Culture, and Community in Downtown Los Angeles for NBA All-Star 2026
summary: Foot Locker today announced its return to NBA All-Star 2026 for the third consecutive year with its biggest activation yet in downtown Los Angeles, 'Foot Locker Takeover'. Building on its partnership with the NBA and longstanding leadership position in basketball, this multi-brand immersive experience will bring highly anticipated sneaker drops, top athletes, creator-led content, and community programming together to connect fans with the culture and the city that shaped the game.

headline: Factbox-Corporate America continues job cuts in 2026 in efficiency push
summary: Less than 30 days into 2026, U.S. companies across sectors have announced layoffs ​as they cut costs and simplify operations ‌in the backdrop of rising adoption of artificial intelligence tools. On Wednesday, ‌tech giant Amazon became the latest, cutting 16,000 roles worldwide in the second major round of job cuts at the company in three months. headline: Nike to reportedly cut 775 US warehouse jobs in automation push – report
summary: The reductions will largely affect warehouse-based jobs at the sportswear group’s facilities in Tennessee and Mississippi.

raw.headline: Nike to reportedly cut 775 US warehouse jobs in automation push – report
raw.summary: The reductions will largely affect warehouse-based jobs at the sportswear group’s facilities in Tennessee and Mississippi.

headline: Nike Job Cuts And Data Breach Concerns Test Turnaround Story
summary: Nike (NYSE:NKE) is cutting 775 jobs at its distribution centers in Tennessee and Mississippi as it increases automation across its supply chain. The workforce reduction comes while the company investigates a potential large scale data breach that may involve internal business systems and consumer information. Both developments are unfolding during a wider restructuring under new leadership as Nike pursues a turnaround plan. Nike is one of the largest global athletic footwear and apparel...

headline: Down More Than 50% in 3 Years, Is Now Finally the Time to Buy Nike Stock?
summary: Nike's top-line performance stabilized in recent quarters. But some key segments are still moving in the wrong direction.
